pr_title: HDDS-3658. Stop to persist container related pipeline info of each ke…

timeline.bodyText:
OmKeyInfo was changed in #1034 to avoid streams.  keyLocationVersions is now converted in a loop:
https://github.com/apache/hadoop-ozone/blob/2af6198686d81daa3ad0513f723118637d2945cf/hadoop-ozone/common/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/ozone/om/helpers/OmKeyInfo.java#L388-L391
That's where normal/compact protobuf conversion should happen depending on ignorePipeline parameter.
timeline.author: adoroszlai

timeline.bodyText: Can we avoid duplication by extracting to a helper method that takes OmKeyLocationInfo conversion function (OmKeyLocationInfo::getCompactProtobuf or OmKeyLocationInfo::getProtobuf)?
timeline.author: adoroszlai

timeline.message: HDDS-3658. Stop to persist container related pipeline info of each key into OM DB to reduce DB size.
